function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of antimicrobial coatings with novel materials","Impact":"Potential false sense of security, possible development of resistant microorganisms","Mitigation":"Educate users about the limitations of the coatings, encourage regular cleaning and disinfection","Technologies":"Education materials, cleaning and disinfection products","People":"Users of surfaces with antimicrobial coatings","Owner":"Health and safety organizations"},{"Description":"Debatable antimicrobial mechanism of graphene materials","Impact":"Uncertainty about effectiveness and potential unintended consequences","Mitigation":"Further research to understand the mechanism, testing for safety and long-term effects","Technologies":"Research facilities, testing equipment","People":"Researchers, scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific organizations"},{"Description":"Interaction between bacteria and GBNs containing surfaces","Impact":"Potential for unintended consequences on bacteria and ecosystems","Mitigation":"Environmental impact assessment, monitoring of ecosystem health","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring equipment","People":"Environmental regulators, researchers","Owner":"Environmental protection agencies, research institutions"}]}
